Text.Page:
Oh, actually I have another job for you.

{@LinkCreature:13#301194#Stonebeak highcrests} have been stealing research equipment and ruining some sensitive measurements on the northeast edge of our base.

Go and see whether you can get some of the research tools back.

When you've got a good supply, take them to Jarius.

This is a welcome surprise! I've been walking around, trying to think of how to complete my research on this magnificent tree structure here. Every time I set these instruments up, these stonebeaks come and steal them. I wonder why....

Anyway, thank you very much for your help.

Adria said someone was out recovering my instruments. Is that you? I ask because you don't seem to have what the {@LinkCreature:13#301194#stonebeak highcrests} stole.

If you have occasion to hit them with weapons or something, I'd really appreciate getting those instruments back...
